title: Hour 2 - Joe Buck (07-24-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Joe Buck (07-24-20)
description:
Dan and the Danettes discuss the new baseball viewing experience, J.R. Smith's bubble underwear shortage, and why college sports are in big trouble if college football is not played. Also, FOX Sports senior broadcaster Joe Buck playfully chides Fritz for repeatedly calling Joe's wife by accident.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
